API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.attributes.MediumAttributes

type
class
extends
AAttributes
version
3.1
This attribute provides very basic simulation of partially opaque medium. You can use this attribute to achieve wide range of effects (e.g., fog, Rayleigh scattering, light attached to camera, etc).

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_nColor Medium color
p_oFadeTo Attenuation vector (500 pixels beyond the screen by default).
p_oFadeFrom Transparent point (at the screen by default).
p_nBlurAmount Maximum amount of blur to add
see
sandy.core.data.Point3D
Creates a new MediumAttributes object.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

begin(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Method called before the display list rendering. This is the common place for this attribute to precompute things.

blurAmount : Float

Maximum amount of blur to add. Warning: this feature is very expensive when shape useSingleContainer is false.

color(__getColor,__setColor) : UInt

Medium color (32-bit value) at the point given by fadeFrom + fadeTo. If this value is transparent, color gradient will be extrapolated beyond that point.

draw(default,method) : p_oGraphics : flash.display.Graphics -> p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Draws attribute to the graphics object.

drawOnSprite(default,method) : p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D -> p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

drawOnSprite(default,method) : p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D -> p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Applies attribute to a sprite.

fadeFrom : sandy.core.data.Point3D

Transparent point in wx, wy and wz coordinates.

fadeTo(__getFadeTo,__setFadeTo) : sandy.core.data.Point3D

Attenuation vector. This is the vector from transparent point to opaque point.

finish(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Method called right after the display list rendering. This is the place to remove and dispose memory if necessary.

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Returns the specific flags of this attribute.

init(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Allows to proceed to an initialization to know when the polyon isn't lined to the material.

unlink(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.AAttributes
Remove all the initialization (opposite of init).
